column1: # DESCRIPTION: Promote business customers from Orion tables to DataStore

column5: DESCRIPTION

column2: WITH contacts AS (SELECT crm_element_hierarchy.element_id, crm_element_hierarchy.parent_id, crm_party.title, crm_party.first_name, crm_party.initials, crm_party.last_name, crm_party.date_of_birth, ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY crm_element_hierarchy.parent_id ORDER BY crm_element_hierarchy.element_id DESC) AS RC FROM [schema].crm_element_hierarchy, [schema].crm_party, [schema].crm_party_flag WHERE crm_element_hierarchy.active = 'Y'AND crm_element_hierarchy.element_struct_code = 'CONTACT'AND crm_party.seq_party_id = crm_element_hierarchy.element_id AND crm_party_flag.seq_party_id = crm_party.seq_party_id AND crm_party_flag.seq_party_flag_type_id = '1') , customerStatus AS (SELECT nc_client.seq_party_id, MAX (CASE WHEN utl_account_status.accnt_status_class_id > 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS CustomerStatus, MAX (CASE WHEN nc_client.Meta_ChangeFlag = 1 OR nc_product.Meta_ChangeFlag = 1 OR nc_product_item.Meta_ChangeFlag = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS Meta_ChangeFlag FROM [schema].nc_client LEFT OUTER JOIN [schema].nc_product ON nc_product.seq_party_id = nc_client.seq_party_id LEFT OUTER JOIN [schema].nc_product_item ON nc_product_item.seq_product_id = nc_product.seq_product_id LEFT OUTER JOIN [schema].utl_account_status ON utl_account_status.accnt_status_id = nc_product_item.accnt_status_id GROUP BY nc_client.seq_party_id)

column3: ,1) = '4' THEN CONCAT(crm_party.std_code, crm_party.phone_no) WHEN LEFT(crm_party.secondary_std_code,1) = '4' THEN CONCAT(crm_party.secondary_std_code, crm_party.secondary_phone_no) ELSE 'Unknown' END AS nchar(10))

column5: Use WITH table to populate Customer Status

column2: FROM [schema].crm_party, [schema].nc_client, [schema].crm_element_hierarchy, contacts AS _contacts, customerStatus AS _customerStatus WHERE nc_client.seq_party_id = crm_party.seq_party_id AND crm_element_hierarchy.element_id = crm_party.seq_party_id AND crm_element_hierarchy.seq_element_type_id = '8' AND _customerStatus.seq_party_id = nc_client.seq_party_id AND _contacts.RC = '1' AND _contacts.parent_id = nc_client.seq_party_id AND (crm_party.Meta_ChangeFlag = 1 OR nc_client.Meta_ChangeFlag = 1 OR crm_element_hierarchy.Meta_ChangeFlag = 1 OR _customerStatus.Meta_ChangeFlag = 1)
